
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(yt-library-clickhouse_functions)
target_compile_options(yt-library-clickhouse_functions PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_include_directories(yt-library-clickhouse_functions PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/clickhouse/src
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/double-conversion
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Foundation/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Net/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Util/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/XML/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/re2
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/rapidjson/include
)
target_link_libraries(yt-library-clickhouse_functions PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yt-yt-core
  contrib-clickhouse-src
)
target_sources(yt-library-clickhouse_functions PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/clickhouse_functions/unescaped_yson.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/clickhouse_functions/yson_parser_adapter.cpp
)

add_global_library_for(yt-library-clickhouse_functions.global yt-library-clickhouse_functions)
target_compile_options(yt-library-clickhouse_functions.global PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_include_directories(yt-library-clickhouse_functions.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/clickhouse/src
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/double-conversion
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Foundation/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Net/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/Util/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/poco/XML/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/re2
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/rapidjson/include
)
target_link_libraries(yt-library-clickhouse_functions.global PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yt-yt-core
  contrib-clickhouse-src
)
target_sources(yt-library-clickhouse_functions.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/clickhouse_functions/convert_yson.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/clickhouse_functions/ypath.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/clickhouse_functions/yson_extract.cpp
)
